declarations.comments:
The `Generic` class asserts the existence of a type function from types
to their representations using the type constructors defined in this module.
declarations.title: Generic

declarations.comments: A representation for types with no constructors.
declarations.title: NoConstructors

declarations.comments: A representation for constructors with no arguments.
declarations.title: NoArguments

declarations.comments: A representation for types with multiple constructors.
declarations.title: Sum

declarations.comments: A representation for constructors with multiple fields.
declarations.title: Product

declarations.comments:
A representation for constructors which includes the data constructor name
as a type-level string.
declarations.title: Constructor

declarations.comments: A representation for an argument in a data constructor.
declarations.title: Argument

declarations.comments: A representation for records.
declarations.title: Rec

declarations.comments:
A representation for a record field which includes the field name
as a type-level string.
declarations.title: Field

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `bottom` member from the `Bounded` type class.
declarations.title: genericBottom

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `top` member from the `Bounded` type class.
declarations.title: genericTop

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `pred` member from the `Enum` type class.
declarations.title: genericPred

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `succ` member from the `Enum` type class.
declarations.title: genericSucc

declarations.comments:
A `Generic` implementation of the `cardinality` member from the
`BoundedEnum` type class.
declarations.title: genericCardinality

declarations.comments:
A `Generic` implementation of the `toEnum` member from the `BoundedEnum`
type class.
declarations.title: genericToEnum

declarations.comments:
A `Generic` implementation of the `fromEnum` member from the `BoundedEnum`
type class.
declarations.title: genericFromEnum

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `eq` member from the `Eq` type class.
declarations.title: genericEq

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `mempty` member from the `Monoid` type class.
declarations.title: genericMempty

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `compare` member from the `Ord` type class.
declarations.title: genericCompare

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `append` member from the `Semigroup` type class.
declarations.title: genericAppend

declarations.comments: A `Generic` implementation of the `show` member from the `Show` type class.
declarations.title: genericShow
